title: Skybridge Boss Scaramucci Predicts Bitcoin’s Value Could Multiply 11-fold With Blackrock’s ETF Approval
description: Anthony Scaramucci, founder of Skybridge Capital, believes that if the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approves Blackrock’s spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund, the value of bitcoin could surge significantly. Scaramucci also discussed Sam Bankman-Fried, the former head of FTX, and Gary Gensler, the current chair of the SEC. Scaramucci Shares His Bold Bitcoin Prediction, Discusses […]

title: Right now is CBDCs’ make or break time
description: The European Central Bank’s latest initiative to propel a digital euro into reality could arguably be the bellwether moment for the newest rendition of money – the Central Bank Digital Currency or CBDC. But as this digital tide sweeps across the globe, are we on the cusp of a monetary evolution or facing a potential ... Read more

title: Critical Thinking Skills Crucial in an AI-Driven World, Says IBM CEO
description: In a recent interview with London’s Sunday Times, IBM’s CEO, Arvind Krishna, emphasized the importance of developing critical thinking skills as the key to future-proofing one’s career in an increasingly AI-driven world. Krishna’s insights shed light on the evolving landscape of employment and the potential impact of artificial intelligence on various industries. Krishna’s advice to ... Read more

title: Bold moves ahead as Governor DeSantis forces special session to take on Iran and rally behind Israel
description: Governor Ron DeSantis is setting a striking tone as he beckons Florida lawmakers back for a special session, House of Senate leaders announced on Friday. The primary objective is to intensify sanctions against Iran and lend unwavering support to Israel. This sudden mobilization has ignited a new wave of discourse, especially given the state’s already ... Read more

title: Magic Eden NFT marketplace temporarily halts BRC-20 trading – But why?
description: Two well-known crypto subjects in the ecosystem, Magic Eden and BRC-20  (Bitcoin Ordinals) have come to a market crash. The growing crypto world has seen the realization of new innovations including the Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs). title: Privacy Concerns Rise as Viral TikTok Account Exploits Facial Recognition Technology
description: In a concerning turn of events, a viral TikTok account has been using off-the-shelf facial recognition technology to dox ordinary individuals, highlighting the increasing challenges surrounding privacy in public spaces. With over 90,000 followers, the account has been exposing individuals who have appeared in viral videos or were suggested by commenters. This unsettling practice involves ... Read more
